title: Equipotentials to determine net positive work

content.description:
The following questions are related to this scenario:

The diagram above shows a cross section of equipotential lines produced by a charge distribution. Points A, B, C, and D lie in the plane of the page.
content.question: A positively charged particle is moved by an external force from rest at one point to rest at another. For which of the following motions would net positive work be required by the external force?

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
